advancedOptions.generateTitleInstruct:
Generate a title for the current document (do not use * " \ / < > : | ? .):
{{substring content 0 255}}

Default (Custom).custom_body:
{
    model: "{{model}}",
    temperature: {{temperature}},
    top_p: {{top_p}},
    frequency_penalty: {{frequency_penalty}},
    presence_penalty: {{presence_penalty}},
    max_tokens: {{max_tokens}},
    n: {{n}},
    stream: {{stream}},
    stop: "{{stop}}",
    messages: {{stringify messages}}
}

Default (Custom) 1.custom_body:
{
    model: "{{model}}",
    temperature: {{temperature}},
    top_p: {{top_p}},
    frequency_penalty: {{frequency_penalty}},
    presence_penalty: {{presence_penalty}},
    max_tokens: {{max_tokens}},
    n: {{n}},
    stream: {{stream}},
    stop: "{{stop}}",
    messages: {{stringify messages}}
}
